originalText.text: Total useless, service sucks, takes ages, and when not done, they don't refund. I consalted them if they were able to evaluate my certificates, and they checked and said YES. So we paid and waited for nearly three months, after three monthly they come back and all it said was not recognized not recognized not recognised on each, why would anyone paid to have their certificate mention that it's not recognized, instead of evaluating they de-valuated them. It's a scam

Excellent and fast service. Quick response. Customer representatives
are very friendly. First mail lost but posted again with no extra cost. Thanks for your quality and customer relations. I recommend all who are looking for degree evaluations.

originalText.text: I had a great experience with this company. I was hesitate at the beginning if it's real company, but everything was fine. I honestly called few times with questions and concerns. I got evaluation of my diploma very fast and accurate. Would recommend! Trustworthy!

originalText.text: Awesome service at the right price. Even after over a year of completing an evaluation, they were extremely responsive to request for a sealed delivery to a different employer.

originalText.text: This company has an example of the best customer service. They're very fast and professional. I'll recommend you to others, thank you very much.
